archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Mimecast / Lotus Notes
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
cloud-based email management for Microsoft Exchange and Microsoft Office 365, including security, archiving, and continuity services to protect business mail
Prior to Post Office Limited's ("POL") separation from the Royal Mail Group ("RMG") (the "Separation") in 2012, POL's email servers were hosted on Lotus Notes. Following the Separation in 2012, POL began to use Microsoft Exchange instead.
Between 2012 and 2016, POL used the email archiving system, "Proofpoint". Since the beginning of 2016, POL has used "Mimecast" for this function.
The email data in POL's possession is limited; and there are practical challenges associated with searching for and exporting email data from Mimecast.
